sentences.sCn: 威奇向约翰的手电筒瞥了一眼。

sentences.sContent: “What is that?” he screamed as his flashlight lit the darkest and dampest corner of the basement.
sentences.sContent_eng: “What is that?” he screamed as his flashlight lit the darkest and dampest corner of the basement.
sentences.sCn: “什么东西？” 当他的手电筒照到地下室最黑暗、最潮湿的角落时，他尖叫起来。

words.tran: 闪光的；瞬间的；俗丽的；暴躁的
发出闪光之物；闪光装置

remMethod.val: 会闪光(flash)的灯(light)， 猜一家用电器。答案： 手电筒(flashlight)

trans.tranOther: a small electric light that you can carry in your hand
